resources.string: Thank you for downloading our app! Just let us show you a few things before you get goin\'.
In offline mode you can enjoy a standard app for reminders. \n Except you can set them for a specific location.
That means you have an account in our app(if you register). You can have friends and set reminders for them. Oh and also…
Your reminders are backed up. This means that wherever you go, you can download our app, sign in and they will automatically be there for you.

In order to use all of this, we need permissions. Both from you and the operating system. If you don\'t mind, accept all of them, but if you don\'t want to, feel free to reject them. However, if you do so, not all features will be working
Why are you still reading? Go!
